page.title: 07MUSIC (BRASS BANDS)
page.content: THE BRASS BAND TRADITION IS STRONG IN CWMPARC AND TREORCHY.{THE PARC AND {DARE BAND}WAS{FORMED}IN CWMPARC IN {1894}BY THE{LOCAL RESIDENTS}.THE BAND DERIVED ITS NAME FROM THE TWO COLLIERIES.THE INSTRUMENTS WERE PAID FOR BY THE LOCAL PEOPLE.THEY HAVE WON EVERY MAJOR WELSH CHAMPIONSHIP,AND THE NATIONAL EISTEDDFOD 14 TIMES.THEY HAVE ALSO PLAYED AT THE ROYAL ALBERT HALL,LONDON AND MADE MANY RECORDINGS. THE LOCAL COMPREHENSIVE HAS THEIR OWN} MIXED BAND{_TREORCHY SCHOOL BAND_ WHICH WAS{FORMED}IN {1953 BY MR IEUAN {MORGAN M.B.E.}IT QUICKLY ROSE TO CLASS A AND WAS THE{FIRST YOUTH BAND}IN THE COUNTRY TO PLAY AT{THE ROYAL ALBERT {HALL,LONDON}.IT HAS WON THE NATIONAL YOUTH CHAMPIONSHIP OF GREAT BRITAIN 3 TIMES.THE BAND HAS ALSO PLAYED IN THE PRESENCE OF{THE DUKE OF EDINBURGH.
